name: The Krusty Cellar
description:
a Spongebob horror game about trying to survive in Mr Krabs' cursed money vault.

---

STORY

Mr Krabs has hidden the secret formula in a chocolate bar, since Plankton hates chocolate and would never look there for it.

Unfortunately, Krabs lost that chocolate bar somewhere in his cellar. He offers you a raise if you're willing to go down there and find it for him.

It's not that easy, of course... The chocolate-loving man who chases Spongebob and Patrick in the show is down there, with his grandma. They don't want you to get away with that chocolate...

---

DISCLAIMER

This video game is NOT an official Spongebob Squarepants product, and it

has no intent to decieve anyone into thinking that it is.

This is a fan-made parody game, by a Spongebob fan, for Spongebob fans.

I, the developer, have no affiliation with the parent company(s) of Spongebob Squarepants.

This game is presented for free, with no paid add-ons and no option to donate.

I would glady immediately remove this game upon request by the owners of Spongebob Squarepants, or by the owners of any site it is published on.
